name: Vinícius Marquesini Terzi
summary: I am a Front-end Developer, graduate of Computer Science. I have 2 years experience providing front-end development, producing high quality responsive websites and exceptional user experience.

skills.name: Responsive Web Design
skills.description: I design websites that work across all devices. They’re fluid and adaptive, just like my process
skills.more: Responsive Web Design is about using HTML and CSS to automatically resize, hide, shrink, or enlarge, a website, to make it look good on all devices (desktops, tablets, and phones).

skills.name: Front-end Development
skills.description: HTML, CSS, & JavaScript - there’s web standards and then there’s browsers, and I know both.
skills.more: Front-end web development is the practice of converting data to graphical interface for user to view and interact with data through digital interaction using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

skills.name: Frameworks
skills.description: Be it Angular, Vue, I can help you and it sure will be a pleasure
skills.more: From scoping requirements to planning content — through design and development — collaboration between myself and clients is paramount.

skills.name: Volunteering
skills.description: If you have any ideas that could make a positive impact on the planet, talk to me
skills.more: I am always open to conversations and exchanges of knowledge about what we can do to contribute and work for nature.

skills.name: And a whole lot more…
skills.more: Adapting to change all the time leaves the path always open for new challenges.
